com.sun.messaging

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.messaging.AdministeredObject
      • com.sun.messaging.Destination
        • com.sun.messaging.BasicTopic
          • com.sun.messaging.Topic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Destination, Topic, javax.naming.Referenceable

    public class Topic
extends BasicTopic
implements javax.naming.Referenceable
    A Topic represents an identity of a repository of messages used in the JMS Publish/Subscribe messaging domain.
    See Also:
    javax.jms.Topic, Serialized Form

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)

        Throws:
